      • extractNumbersFromDirectory

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> extractNumbersFromDirectory(java.nio.file.Path path)
                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        This will extract only the numbers characters for each line in a file.
        Parameters:
        path - the file system path to extract the lines from
        Returns:
        the set of lines from the file containing only the numbers from those lines
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • validateFilePath

        public static void validateFilePath(java.nio.file.Path path)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        This will validate that a path is valid, that it is a file (not a directory) and it is readable.
        Parameters:
        path - the file system path to validate
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
